Motown is an American record company. The record company was founded by 
Berry Gordy, Jr. as Tamla Records on January 12, 1959, and incorporated as 
Motown Record Corporation on April 14, 1960, in Detroit, Michigan. The name, a 
portmanteau of motor and town, has also become a nickname for Detroit.
